mapper.select: SELECT k.keyword_id, k.name AS keyword, COUNT(*) AS count FROM borehole AS b JOIN inventory_borehole AS ib ON ib.borehole_id = b.borehole_id JOIN inventory_keyword AS ik ON ik.inventory_id = ib.inventory_id JOIN keyword AS k ON k.keyword_id = ik.keyword_id WHERE b.prospect_id = 4 GROUP BY k.keyword_id, k.name ORDER BY k.name

SELECT DISTINCT cd.core_diameter_id, cd.core_diameter, cd.name, un.unit_id, un.name AS unit_name, un.abbr FROM borehole AS bh JOIN inventory_borehole AS ib ON ib.borehole_id = bh.borehole_id JOIN inventory AS iv ON iv.inventory_id = ib.inventory_id JOIN core_diameter AS cd ON cd.core_diameter_id = iv.core_diameter_id LEFT OUTER JOIN unit AS un ON un.unit_id = cd.unit_id WHERE bh.prospect_id = #{id} ORDER BY cd.core_diameter
SELECT bh.borehole_id, bh.name, ST_AsText(bg.geom) AS wkt FROM borehole AS bh JOIN borehole_geom AS bg ON bh.borehole_id = bg.borehole_id WHERE bh.prospect_id = #{id}
